page.title: 13TAF FECHAN WATER BOARD 2
page.content: Down the corridor is a chemical room which has in it two tanks containing lime.A little further down the corridor is a purifying drum which cleans the water with a metal fabric mesh.All the dead leaves and dirt gets trapped in the mesh and the clean water comes out of the bottem.Ifthe drum gets clogged with dirt the small sprays on top of the drum unclog it.Outside there is an overflow which stopped the reservoir from flooding. The water board is an important employer in the village of Pontsti_ cill.Many of the village people either work in the filter houes or travel from the village to do repair work on the surrounding roads.In winter the villagers are fortunate that the roads are kept free of snow because the water board has to keep the roads open.
